categories.summary:
# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
The chat primarily revolves around technical issues with ElizaOS installation, plugin integration, and version compatibility. Users encountered problems with package naming discrepancies, where the documented plugin name (`@elizaos/plugin-discord`) differed from the actual working package (`@elizaos-plugins/client-discord`). Several users reported difficulties setting up ElizaOS with both alpha and beta versions, encountering dependency errors and import issues with CommonJS modules. Specifically, one user faced an error with the EventEmitter import from eventemitter3. Twitter integration was another pain point, with users experiencing "339 errors" when deploying to servers despite working locally. There were also questions about MCP (Multi-Chain Protocol) support, which appears to have a recently announced plugin. A user submitted a PR to fix documentation discrepancies. Several users expressed interest in contributing to the project or participating in demo events.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Are we able to use eliza agent on the beta? (asked by Âè§Â•á ÈªëÈ¨º) A: Unanswered
Q: Should I be using alpha: 1.0.0-alpha.67? (asked by 4n7m4n) A: Unanswered
Q: Does eliza support MCP? (asked by Nate Codes) A: An MCP plugin was recently announced (answered by chris.troutner)
Q: Is there a deve school coming up? (asked by 4n7m4n) A: Unanswered
Q: Is there any final solution for twitter 339 error? (asked by Mickey) A: Unanswered
Q: What is the best version to run an ai agent auto posting in twitter? (asked by Rascar) A: Unanswered
Q: Is there anywhere i can find tickets or todos? (asked by √¶nima1) A: Unanswered
Q: How can I import eliza the agent? (asked by Âè§Â•á ÈªëÈ¨º) A: Unanswered
Q: What's the process to participate on the demo day? (asked by 0xn1c0) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: 4n7m4n | Helpee: Community | Context: Incorrect plugin name in documentation | Resolution: Identified correct package name (@elizaos-plugins/client-discord instead of @elizaos/plugin-discord) and submitted PR to fix docs
Helper: jin | Helpee: 4n7m4n | Context: User didn't know where docs were located | Resolution: Jin informed that docs are in v2-develop branch in packages folder
Helper: jin | Helpee: 4n7m4n | Context: User submitted PR to fix documentation | Resolution: Jin acknowledged and shared the PR link (https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/pull/4047)

## 4. Action Items
Type: Technical | Description: Fix package name in documentation from @elizaos/plugin-discord to @elizaos-plugins/client-discord | Mentioned By: 4n7m4n
Type: Technical | Description: Resolve Twitter 339 error when deploying to servers | Mentioned By: Mickey
Type: Technical | Description: Fix text embedding error causing agent crashes | Mentioned By: Humann
Type: Documentation | Description: Create guide for proper state management in plugins | Mentioned By: 4n7m4n
Type: Documentation | Description: Provide clear installation instructions for different versions (alpha/beta) | Mentioned By: 4n7m4n
Type: Documentation | Description: Create guide for Twitter integration with ElizaOS | Mentioned By: Rascar
Type: Feature | Description: Implement RTS swarm faction/agent economics simulation | Mentioned By: cjft
